channel.title: 718 non MYSQL version question
channel.description: My co-owner accidentally IP banned my account, nbd right? Well when it happened it gave the 6 people who were online items they should not of received. Is there a way I can remove just the items from the peoples bank and inventories since this is a non MYSQL source? Or am I screwed and I need to delete all the accounts affected?

item.title: 718 non MYSQL version question
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

ask the players to drop the items or something if they dont delete there accounts .-.

Read full topic

item.title: 718 non MYSQL version question
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“nickcheese, post:5, topic:477327”][quote author=aciraccar link=topic=595520.msg4193017#msg4193017 date=1357086338]
login to their accounts and destroy items simple since your owner you can easily get their passwords -.-
[/quote]

What file do I look into to access their info? Since I don’t have mysql and player files are P files what file do i edit for this?[/quote]

You’re not going to be able to if the player files are serialized.

Read full topic

item.title: 718 non MYSQL version question
item.dc:creator: @nickcheese nickcheese
item.description:
@nickcheese wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:477327”][quote author=nickcheese link=topic=595520.msg4192998#msg4192998 date=1357085091]
My co-owner accidentally IP banned my account, nbd right? Well when it happened it gave the 6 people who were online items they should not of received. Is there a way I can remove just the items from the peoples bank and inventories since this is a non MYSQL source? Or am I screwed and I need to delete all the accounts affected?
[/quote]

Unless you know exactly which items they have that they shouldn’t, and know that they haven’t traded them to anyone, it’s going to be tough.[/quote]

Some are not even on so some they are just in the inventory, others some could be in bank, I know all the amounts of items. It is only 3 people now. Is there a certain file I can edit or do I have to base it on trust or just delete the accounts affected by it?

Read full topic

item.title: 718 non MYSQL version question
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

nickcheese:

My co-owner accidentally IP banned my account, nbd right? Well when it happened it gave the 6 people who were online items they should not of received. Is there a way I can remove just the items from the peoples bank and inventories since this is a non MYSQL source? Or am I screwed and I need to delete all the accounts affected?

Unless you know exactly which items they have that they shouldn’t, and know that they haven’t traded them to anyone, it’s going to be tough.
